title: A Day in the Life-D.C. Does Syr
name: A Day in the Life-D.C. Does Syr
description:
A Map by Dlangsprojects

Check it! I be here by myself and am going to share with all of my fans out there some of the places and things that I do in a typical day. Feel free to comment on any of the photos and I will be glad to elaborate on the details of the picture.

properties.name: 918 Ackerman Biotch
properties.description: Posted by DlangsprojectsYeah we know how to do it. This neighborhood is dangerous though. Make sure that you pack your mase and carry a switchblade. Listen- there be some mad crazy things happening here. I mean it. For instance last weekend I was involved in a boxing match on my front yard that drew a crowd of over a hundred people in less than five minutes and everyone was yelling kill him! beat his face! The people around here do not f around so remember what I told you and pack heat.

properties.name: Alto Cinco
properties.description: Posted by Dlangsprojects 526 Westcott St, Syracuse, NYA really good place to get a burrito. this place makes you never want to go back to chipoltle.

properties.name: Brewster Boland Dormintory
properties.description: Posted by DlangsprojectsThere realy is nothing pleasant about living in what the students call BB. Besides the amazing dining hall and the possibility of living in a newly renovated room, in general the location makes life hell.

properties.name: Carnigie Library
properties.description: Posted by Dlangsprojectsaddress

properties.name: Course University Hospital
properties.description: Posted by Dlangsprojects This is supposed to be the best hospital in the area and it prides itself on the slogan-crouse cares.

properties.name: Flannigan Gymnasium
properties.description: Posted by Dlangsprojects A place where you can enrol in everything from scuba diving to yoga and if you don\'t want to do a physical class, there are always basketball hoops, tredmills, pools, racketball courts, and studios available.

properties.name: HSBC
properties.description: Posted by DlangsprojectsNothing special about this building. It is just where I made this map so i thought that it was worth tagging. There is a writing center on the first floor for anyone who wants to improve an essay

properties.name: Hall Of Languages
properties.description: Posted by DlangsprojectsUniversity Pl, Syracuse, NY 13210The Hall of Languages was the building which started what is now Syracuse University.

properties.name: Halo Tattoo Parlor
properties.description: Posted by DlangsprojectsMarshall St. Syracuse NY 13210The Halo Tattoo Parlor is a very popular place. The open attmosphere and vibrant colors make the place perfect for getting inked. I in fact had my first one there.

properties.name: Heaven's Staircase
properties.description: Posted by DlangsprojectsHeaven\'s Staircase is nothing more than three hundred rising steps up the side of a hill. However it is more than just a simple piece of construction, because to travel up the stairs at night is like taking a trip to heaven: you have to be brave and you can\'t look back. If you do the darkness will swallow you up and devour your last remnants of hope. At the top of this staircase there lies a treasure. It is not something that you can place in your hand, but rather something that your experience with your soul. the world is below you. Syracuse spralls our around you, oblivious to your mountain top hollow. If you are so brave as to make the jounrey at night, I pray that the clouds part for you, so that you might gaze at the gems of the sky. Perhaps Nomas DIe.

properties.name: Heaven's Staircase
properties.description: Posted by DlangsprojectsWestminster ParkThe staircase itself is over three hundred steps and has to rise at least four hundred feet. I have been to the top at night and delighted in the stars. The trip to get to that heavenly bliss was like a walk through sleepy hollow. Dark is the path. But at the top there is open space illuminated by halogen bulbs. What a perfect spot for a halloween party.

properties.name: Lyon's Hall
properties.description: Posted by DlangsprojectsEuclid Ave. Syracuse NYThis building used to be the International Living Center, but in 2007 the building was renamed and now is an official dorm.

properties.name: Maggie's Tavern
properties.description: Posted by Dlangsprojects720 University Ave, Syracuse, NYMaggie\'s is nothing more than a bar with a college atmosphere. The scene at Maggie\'s is fun and there typically is alot of dancing.

properties.name: Marshall St.
properties.description: Posted by Dlangsprojects Marshall St. Syracuse NY 13210marshall Street is home to just about everything. There is food, entertainment and shopping. For the Syracuse University Student lucky enough to have a look alike id, Marshall street is where they likely are spending their evenings.

properties.name: New STC
properties.description: Posted by Dlangsprojects

properties.name: Shaw Hall
properties.description: Posted by DlangsprojectsShaw Hall houses about four hundred students and a dinning hall.

properties.name: Syracuse University Quad
properties.description: Posted by DlangsprojectsThanks to the high definition quality of this map, you can actually see the paths that stretch across the quad. Wow. That is something special.

properties.name: The Carrier Dome
properties.description: Posted by Dlangsprojects The largest iglo in New York State. This giant white blob supported by concrete pillars has been the home of Syracuse Sports for over twenty-five years. Thanks to the vision of Nancy Canton the space now is all about Syracuse University. The walls display poster size photographs of some of the great dome moments. Unfortunately Syracuse Football sucks. I can\'t wait for basketball season.

properties.name: Thornden Park Ampitheater
properties.description: Posted by DlangsprojectsThornden Dr Syracuse NY

properties.name: Thornden Park Rose Garden
properties.description: Posted by Dlangsprojects A beautiful gem that I came across freshman year. The garden is circular with a central gazebo. Roses of almost every color available are grown here and start bloooming in early july.

properties.name: Twelve Brothers Market
properties.description: Posted by Dlangsprojects827 Euclid Ave, Syracuse, NYA small convneince store with a wide variety of tobacco products and roling papers. Family owned. Mas Sallam

properties.name: Varsity Pizza
properties.description: Posted by Dlangsprojects802 S Crouse Ave, Syracuse, NYYour basic pizza- lots of grease but well worth it.

properties.name: Whitman School of Management
properties.description: Posted by Dlangsprojects This building was completed in June 2006 and is the home to Syracuse University School of Management.
